item.title: Brux.-Midi/Brus.-Zuid - Hal / Halle
item.description:
From 2/04 to 9/06 Infrabel is working on the track.

Train traffic is adapted between Brux.-Midi/Brus.-Zuid and Hal / Halle:
The route and departure times of most trains running between Brux.-Midi/Brus.-Zuid and Hal / Halle change.

Only one out of two S2 trains Louvain / Leuven - Bruxelles / Brussel - Braine-le-Comte / 's-Gravenbrakel stops in Buizingen.

Most of the weekends: An SNCB bus runs between Brux.-Midi/Brus.-Zuid and Hal / Halle.

In order to know the best alternative to your train journey, plan your journey through sncb.be or the SNCB app.

The travel planner takes these changes into account.
